$listeners.desc: All native events are being propagated (you don't need the '.native' modifier)

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

options.desc: Array of objects with value and label props. The binary components will be created according to this array; Props from QToggle, QCheckbox or QRadio can also be added as key/value pairs to control the components singularly
examples: :options="[ { label: 'Option 1', value: 'op1' }, { label: 'Option 2', value: 'op2' }, { label: 'Option 3', value: 'op3', disable: true } ]"

name.desc: Used to specify the name of the controls; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

type.desc: The type of input component to be used

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

keep-color.desc: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when input components are unticked?

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

left-label.desc: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the input components

inline.desc: Show input components as inline-block rather than each having their own row

input.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model
